arts.ttl: Coppa Italia | Torino v Empoli: Probable Lineups
arts.sum: Empoli are set to face Torino in the Round of 16 of the Coppa Italia, looking to continue their impressive unbeaten start to the season. Manager Roberto Dâ€™Aversa is expected to make some changes to the lineup that defeated Cagliari in their last Serie A match, while maintaining the 3-4-2-1 formation that has served the team well so far. In goal, Devis Vasquez is likely to retain his place. The defense could see the first start for new signing Mattia De Sciglio, alongside either Ardian Ismajli or Simone Marianucci, with Mattia Viti completing the back three.
